Text: Ashish Sharma:  He is recognized for his roles as Lord Ram in the TV show "Siya Ke Ram" , as Major Rudra Pratap Ranawat in the TV show "Rangrasiya" and as "Chandragupta Maurya" in "Chandragupta Maurya TV Show" on NDTV-Imagine TV.
